forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 69. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
